QueryDefinition.Query: select acp.patid, acp.spno, acp.epikey, cast(CONCAT(cast(acp.patid as varchar), cast(acp.spno as varchar)) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, CONCAT(cast(acp.patid as varchar), cast(acp.epikey as varchar)) as description, case when acp.acpstar is null or acp.acpstar = '' then acp.epistart else acp.acpstar end as event_date, case when acp.acpend is null or acp.acpend = '' then acp.epiend else acp.acpend end as event_date_end, case when acp.acploc NOT IN (13, 15, 16) then 1 else 0 end as Observation, case when acp.acploc NOT IN (13, 15, 16) then 32037 else 9201 end as visit_concept_id FROM {sc}.augmented_care_periods acp join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND acp.patid = ch.PERSON_ID order by acp.patid
